name: Envim Demo Terrain
description:
Envim Demo Terrain is a sample of what my upcoming asset can do. This is an example of a smaller scale (2.4km by 2.4km) map to give an idea of how the terrain will be generated. Envim will be available on the Unity Asset Store soon. Follow my facebook page for updates https://www.facebook.com/InclineStudioLabel

NOTE: This terrain was optimized for WebGL.
